content: snow flake crochet knit look hat by kelsey daughtry from kids knots and my everyday life snow flake crochet knit look hat yarn big twist sincerely - navy - white bernat softee chunky - white hook h/5 00mm i/5 50mm other material clover x-large pom-pom maker tapestry needle scissors measuring tape abbreviation single_crochet single_crochet scblo single_crochet back loop only wst waist coat stitch slip_stitch chain pattern with h/5 00mm hook in navy rib chain 11 leave a long end to be able to sew ends together row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 10sc row 2 70 in back loop only single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 10sc sew the two short ends together *this hat will now be worked in rounds *each row from the rib will count as a stitch example 70 row = 70 stitches *rib should measure 20 inches change hook size to achieve this with i/5 50mm hook hat will now be worked into two colors n=navy w=white body round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in every stitch around slip_stitch to join chain 1 70 single_crochet *from here you will work the pattern in the waistcoat stitch picture tutorials can be found at the bottom on this pattern the waistcoat stitch is a single_crochet done in the middle of the single_crochet from the pervious row *this pattern i worked up from a graph the pattern will be written for color changes example with the first row you will do 4n 1w 5n 1w 7n 1w x4 5n 1w 3n the n stands for navy and the w for white the times sign x tells you what section you will repeat the 4 is for how many times you will do the sequences it is not that you should do the sequences and then repeat 4 more times it will just be do the sequences 4 times once again all stitches will be done in the wst waistcoat stitch *you will need to carry the color yarn you re not using behind the stitch you are crocheting picture tutorial at the bottom of this pattern round 2 -
